member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Tracking.Conditions.ContactAutomationCampaignBaseCondition`1
member.summary: A base class for classic Sitecore rules engine conditions which evaluate whether the contact is currently or was in a given automation campaign or activity of an automation campaign.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Tracking.Conditions.ContactAutomationCampaignBaseCondition`1.TryParse(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Tries to find the string representation of a GUID within definition and to convert its globally unique identifier (GUID) equivalent. A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
member.param: Id of an automation plan.
Skip matches.
member.returns: Conversion result with value. true if was converted successfully; otherwise, false.
